title: Cash Flow Projection Service
description:
Implement Cash Flow Projection Engine with Payment Timing and Collection Forecasts

Build a financial forecasting system that projects future cash flows by analyzing payment schedules, receivables, and collection patterns to provide accurate liquidity predictions.

Requirements:
- Design data model for payment schedules, invoices, and historical collection patterns
- Implement algorithm to calculate projected cash inflows based on:
  * Outstanding receivables with expected collection dates
  * Historical collection rate patterns by customer/segment
  * Aging analysis to adjust collection probability
  * Recurring revenue streams with payment cycles
- Implement algorithm to calculate projected cash outflows based on:
  * Scheduled payment obligations (payroll, rent, vendors)
  * Accounts payable with due dates
  * Recurring expenses and their frequencies
  * Planned capital expenditures
- Generate rolling cash flow projections for configurable time periods (30/60/90 days, quarterly, annual)
- Calculate key metrics:
  * Net cash position by period
  * Minimum cash balance (cash runway)
  * Peak funding requirements
  * Days cash on hand
- Handle edge cases:
  * Late payments and adjustable collection assumptions
  * Early payment discounts
  * Seasonal variation in cash flows
  * Currency conversion for multi-currency scenarios
- Provide visualization of projected vs. actual cash position
- Enable scenario modeling with adjustable assumptions (optimistic/pessimistic collection rates)
- Export projections in standard formats (CSV, Excel, PDF reports)

Technical Considerations:
- Ensure calculations are performant for large transaction volumes
- Support historical data import for training collection rate models
- Implement audit trail for assumption changes
- Design for extensibility to add new cash flow categories
